tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pharmacogenomics_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    genotype VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    response_score FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE drug_information(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    drug_class VARCHAR(255),
    target_gene VARCHAR(255),
    dosage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DrugGeneInteraction (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_id INT,
    gene_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_strength FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE interaction (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT,
    drug_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_strength VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY(gene_id) REFERENCES gene_information(gene_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(drug_id) REFERENCES drug_information(drug_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Drug (
  drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  drug_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Gene (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  gene_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DrugGeneInteraction (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_id INT,
  gene_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Gene(gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Patient (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE DrugPrescription (
  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  drug_id INT,
  prescription_date DATE,
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (drug_id) REFERENCES Drug(drug_id)
)
